data.title: West Ham Pop
data.meta_description: Peppermint Bars and Events introduces a West Ham Pop-up Fanzone at Queen Elizabeth Olymic Park, located next to The Orbit. This free fanzone is open to all West Ham ticket holders and will be operating on all home match days for the remainder of the 23/24 season.
data.text:
Welcome to Riverside East, an exciting brand new multi-purpose venue coming to East London in Spring 2024.

Situated in the heart of Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park by the landmark ArcelorMittal Orbit and Slide, the new space will be a testament to creativity and innovation.

Peppermint has collaborated with The London Legacy Development Corporation to deliver this new space to the community in the next few months. Read more about it here.

Whilst we navigate our way through the building and development phase of Riverside East, we are delighted to bring the fans of West Ham a dedicated pop up fanzone with an unbeatable location, right next to the London Stadium.

For the remainder of the season, we will have a free fanzone available to all ticket holders for all future home matches until Spring 2024.
